title: Vanilla SQL Injection Vulnerability

profile.name: Vanilla
profile.about: Vanilla is a powerfully simple discussion forum you can easily customize to make as unique as your community.

activities.message:
The complete SQL executed in the database is as follows:
**delete  from GDN_Invitation where 1=benchmark(40000000,sha(1)) and 1 = 'balisong'**
More intuitive to see that we have successfully injected SQL statements

Thanks for the detailed report. We'll triage this with priority by the end of Monday. I expect it will be patched by the end of the week (I'm assuming we'll be able to reproduce it based on your notes).
Hi there. This report has been triaged as a legitimate exploit and has been triaged. Thank you.

summaries.content:
Because the value of invitationID is controlled by the attacker, an attacker can construct an array and perform SQL injection.
